title: khElathi piNDaNDE
sahitya:
khElati piNDANDE bhagavAn khElati piNDANDE
anupallavi

hamsaha sO-aham hamsaha sO-aham hamsaha sO-aham sO-ahamiti
caraNam 1

paramatmA-aham paripUrNO-aham brahmaivA-aham brahyOti
   
caraNam 2

tvakcakSuhu shruti jihvAghrANE pancavidha prANOpasthAnE
   
caraNam 3

shabda sparsha rasAdikamAtrE sAtvika rAjasa tAmasa mitrE
   
caraNam 4

buddhi manash-cittAhankArE pUjala tEjO gagana samIrE
   
caraNam 5

paramahamsa rUpENa vihartA brahma viSNu rudrAdika kartA
